enchantment.hasoook.blast.desc: Attacks will generate an explosion at the target location.
enchantment.hasoook.blunt.desc: Reduce melee attack damage of items.
enchantment.hasoook.breath_looting.desc: Attacks will deplete the target's oxygen.
enchantment.hasoook.frost_thorns.desc: To inflict retaliatory damage with frost on the attacker.
enchantment.hasoook.looted.desc: When attacking, there is a chance that items will be stolen.
enchantment.hasoook.soul_entanglement.de: Lower movement speed on soul sand and soul soil, and may attract Evoker Fang attacks.
enchantment.hasoook.hematology.desc: When attacked, there's a possibility of restoring health to the attack.
enchantment.hasoook.let_you_fly.desc: Knock the pretentious goals out of the sky.
enchantment.hasoook.transcription.desc: Crafted with an enchanted book, copying the contents of the enchanted book.
